column2: Directive  by  the  4th  Respondent  to  the  5th  Respondent,  the  Director
General of Customs to “Please implement the above rates with effect from
Directive  by  the  Additional  Director  General  of  Customs  (Revenue  and

Services) 
to 
the  Directors  of  Customs 
(ICT)  and 
(PP&R), 
“To 
take

immediate  action  to  effect  the  above  two  changes 
from  12midnight
(22/08 – 23/08)”. This directive had been made at 1845 hrs of 22nd August
